review: we had very bad experience under Dr. Chitra Ramamurthy's treatment. my wife had 2 nos. of miscarriage's when she was under her treatment. she gives jus 30 second to max 1 minute during consulting and no satisfactory answers as she always in hurry to take-up next patient inspite we pay full consultancy and under go paid prescribed tests. ** *** *** ** ******** ** **** ******** ******* *** ********* ************ ******** ** ** ***** really disappointed with her ** ** **** *** ******** ******** *** ** *** ********** *** **** ** *********

review: Extremely ignorant *** **** **** ********* ** **** ******* I stayed in her cabin just for 5mins and in that 5mins she got 4 phone calls and she was least bothered to even ask what is the reason for my visit. She just saw my blood test reports and came to a conclusion that the baby needs to be terminated. She did not even look at my ultra scan reports. I have consulted a different docto* *** **** **** ********* **** ** **** ** ** **** ******* **** ************** *** **** **** ******* **** ** ** ********* *** ***** ****** ******* ** ** ** ****** ** ***** **** *** ******** *** ** ***** ********** *** **** ** ***********

Chitra Bengi is always a very good doctor for me 
I forget about my problems when i go to her 
She has a poitive approach towards hr patients

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: It is my first consultation with the doctor and I would like to strongly recommend her. She is friendly, tries to address all questions in simple language, and did not seem to prescribe anything unnecessarily. If you can ignore the hospital staff's impatient responses and long delay for consultation, you will have a good experience with the doctor; her experience speaks.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: She was understanding, gave us confidence. Guided us perfectly which yielded result. Waiting time is not much for such an experienced doctor. Pretty happy with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She has been my gynaecologist from the beginning . She is understanding and explains very clearly. She clears all the doubts and has patiently answered all queries
